snippet: The oldest man-made, outdoor object in New York is the towering, granite obelisk in Central Park known as Cleopatra’s Needle: It’s nearly 3,500 years old.
lead_paragraph: The oldest man-made, outdoor object in New York is the towering, granite obelisk in Central Park known as Cleopatra’s Needle: It’s nearly 3,500 years old.

headline.main: A (Big) Bit of Egypt in Central Park
headline.print_headline: A (Big) Bit of Egypt In Central Park
